Hi Umer,

> 
> I will write more about my work later. 
>

Sounds like a very interesting experiment.  Thanks for sharing it.  
A few questions: Do you have any pictures or animations from your
work?  Also, what were the final networks like in terms of topology? 
Finally, like Derek, I also wonder which version of NEAT you used, or
if you wrote your own?

Good luck with your grad school applications.  Are you thinking of
applying in the US?

ken
